attributes.action: Ban the use of public money to fund the training of imans or any other pro muslim cause
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has been mooted that public monies should be used to fund the training of imans for uk mosques. Since no other religion benefits from such monies to train it's preachers, this is a blatant excuse to buy off muslims at the public charge. No muslim cause or activity should be provided from or benefit from public money.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ban the use of public money to fund the training of imans or any other pro muslim cause."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16485

Prime Minister's Office
